Please only send a pull request to branches that are currently supported: https://laraxgram.github.io/releases.html#support-policy

If you are unsure which branch your pull request should be sent to, please read: https://laraxgram.github.io/contributions.html#which-branch

Pull requests without a descriptive title, thorough description, or tests will be closed.

In addition, please describe the benefit to end users; the reasons it does not break any existing features; how it makes building bot applications easier, etc.
